info.title: Cellar Service
info.description: HTTP service for managing your wine cellar

servers.description: cellar hosts the storage, sommelier and swagger services.

put.description: Update bottles with the given IDs. This is a multipart request and each part has field name 'bottle' and contains the encoded bottle info to be updated. The IDs in the query parameter is mapped to each part in the request.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: IDs of the bottles to be updated

schema.description: IDs of the bottles to be updated

example: Excepturi accusamus praesentium tenetur porro aliquid magnam.
Aspernatur dolorem tenetur consectetur aut deserunt veritatis.

tags.name: sommelier
tags.description: The sommelier service retrieves bottles given a set of criteria.

tags.name: storage
tags.description: The storage service makes it possible to view, add or remove wine bottles.

tags.name: swagger
tags.description: The swagger service serves the API swagger definition.
